com.swirlds.platform.Transaction

  • Packages that use Transaction 
    Package Description
    com.swirlds.platform
    Provides the core Swirlds platform.

    • Uses of Transaction in com.swirlds.platform

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Transaction[] Transaction.readArray​(DataInputStream dis, int[] byteCount)
      Reconstructs an array of Transaction objects from a DataInputStream.

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int Transaction.compareTo​(Transaction that)
      Compares this object with the specified object for order.
      boolean Platform.createTransaction​(Transaction trans)
      The SwirldMain object calls this method when it wants to create a new transaction.
      void SwirldState.expandSignatures​(Transaction trans)
      Called against a given Transaction only once and immediately after the event is added to the hashgraph.
      void SwirldState.handleTransaction​(long id, boolean isConsensus, Instant timeCreated, Instant timestamp, Transaction trans, Address address)
      Given a transaction, update the state to reflect its effect.
